definitions.definition: The female genitalia, especially the vulva.
An extremely unpleasant or objectionable person (in US, especially a woman; in UK, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand more usually a man).

definitions.example: Fix the car? I’ll sort the cunt out at the weekend.

definitions.definition: An unpleasant or difficult experience or incident.
A woman, women, or bottom (i.e. submissive partner, not the top) as a source of sex.
definitions.example: I’m going to hit the clubs and see if I can get me some cunt.

definitions.definition: (positive) (with words funny, good) A person (mostly between male friends); compare bastard.
definitions.example: Tom's a good cunt: he fixed my car and didn't even charge me for it!
